verses.verse: And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H423>swearing,<s%> and is a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> he hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> of it; <S%H518>if<s%> he do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>utter<s%> it, then he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> if a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H176>whether<s%> it be a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H2416>beast,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things,<s%> and if it be <S%H5956>hidden<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him; <S%H1931>he<s%> also shall be <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> it be <S%H834>that<s%> a man shall be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> withal, and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him; when <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> of it, then he shall be <S%H816>guilty.<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H981>pronouncing<s%> with his <S%H8193>lips<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to do <S%H3190>good,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> it be that a <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H981>pronounce<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%> and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> him; when <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> of it, then he shall be <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H4480>these.<s%> <S%H428><s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he shall be <S%H816>guilty<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H4480>these<s%> <S%H428><s%> things, that he shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> that thing:

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> a <S%H3776>lamb<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H8166>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him concerning his <S%H4480>sin.<s%> <S%H2403><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H3808>not<s%> able to <S%H5060>bring<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H1767><s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> for his <S%H817>trespass,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H2398>committed,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> is for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> and wring <S%H4454>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H4136><s%> his <S%H6203>neck,<s%> but shall <S%H3808>not<s%> divide it asunder: <S%H914><s%>

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and the <S%H7604>rest<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be wrung <S%H4680>out<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>manner:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him for his <S%H4480>sin<s%> <S%H2403><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

But <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H3808>not<s%> able to <S%H5381>bring<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons,<s%> then he <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> the tenth <S%H6224>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> he shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H5414>put<s%> any <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

Then shall he <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7061>take<s%> his <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H7062><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it, <S%H853>even<s%> a <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him as <S%H5921>touching<s%> his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in <S%H4480>one<s%> <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480>these,<s%> <S%H428><s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him: and the remnant shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's,<s%> as a meat <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance,<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> for his <S%H817>trespass<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> with thy <S%H6187>estimation<s%> by <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> for a trespass offering: <S%H817><s%>

And he shall make <S%H7999>amends<s%> for the harm that he hath <S%H834>done<s%> <S%H2398><s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the holy <S%H6944>thing,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the fifth <S%H2549>part<s%> <S%H5921>thereto,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of these <S%H4480>things<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3808>forbidden<s%> to be <S%H6213>done<s%> by the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> though he <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3808>not,<s%> yet is he <S%H816>guilty,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> with thy <S%H6187>estimation,<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H7683>erred<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3808>not,<s%> and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.
It <S%H1931><s%> is a trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> he hath certainly <S%H816>trespassed<s%> <S%H816><s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
